overview: Surf One explores the life and experiences of a tribe of surfers who search for the perfect wave and look to pass the stoke of surfing on to the younger generation. Surf One presented by Postmodern Surfer takes you behind the scenes with the best surfers in the world.  Great interviews and archived footage of the legends of the sport.  The film travels to epic swells through North America, Indonesa and Spain. Documenting the surfing and times of Tom Curren, Bobby Martinez, Renny Yater, Dane Reynolds and the the youth of today. The music is written & performed by Burleigh Skidmore, Ribsy's Nickel and Spencer The Gardner.
tagline: Surf One explores the life and experiences of a tribe of surfers who search for the perfect wave and look to pass the stoke of surfing on to the younger generation.
title: Surf One
